com.google.enterprise.connector.spi

Class SimpleConnectorFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.enterprise.connector.spi.SimpleConnectorFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConnectorFactory

    public class SimpleConnectorFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements ConnectorFactory
    Simple implementation of the ConnectorFactory interface. Connector developers may want to use this to implement unit tests.
    Since:
    2.4

    • Constructor Summary

      SimpleConnectorFactory(Connector instance)

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Connector makeConnector(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> config)
      Make a Connector instance of the ConnectorType that owns this ConnectorFactory instance using the supplied Map of configuration properties.

    • Method Detail

      • makeConnector

        public Connector makeConnector(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> config)
                        throws RepositoryException
        Description copied from interface: ConnectorFactory
        Make a Connector instance of the ConnectorType that owns this ConnectorFactory instance using the supplied Map of configuration properties.
        Specified by:
        makeConnector in interface ConnectorFactory
        Parameters:
        config - a Map of configuration properties. If null, the Map that was passed to validateConfig is used.
        Returns:
        a Connector instance, instantiated by the Connector Manager in exactly the same way as it would if this config were valid and persisted.
        Throws:
        RepositoryException - if a subclass overrides this method and throws RepositoryException.
